Requirement is satisfied here: get_Doorlocking_KeylessAdvanced_ControlAndKeylessDistance ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/BAP/BAPHandler_Doorlocking/Evo/inc/BAPHandler_Doorlocking_DataHandler.h line 5403 Requirement is satisfied here: get_Doorlocking_KeylessAdvanced_Extension1AndModification ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/BAP/BAPHandler_Doorlocking/Evo/src/BAPHandler_Doorlocking_DataHandler.c line 3079 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/BAP/BAPHandler_Doorlocking/Evo/test/swut/BAPHandler_Doorlocking_DataHandler.c.test line 9167 Handling of the default value

IF the KeylessAdvanced function is available in FunctionList THEN the Doorlocking BAP Handler shall forward the value of the Bit1 of the Doorlocking.KeylessAdvanced.Control parameter by means of the pBAP_bKYKonfAutoEntry internal signal ELSE the Doorlocking BAP Handler shall forward the value 0x0B by means of the pBAP_bKYKonfAutoEntry internal signal ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_BAPH_DoorL_762 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
